Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time between SW-EIC Accept and Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to be done after Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time until Awaiting Assignment to Batch is performed following First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Elapsed time between Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Awaiting Assignment to Batch in multi-round revision cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and Awaiting Assignment to Batch across all variants ending with acceptance
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch relative to the final Manuscript Export Succeeded event in accepted manuscripts
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average waiting time to the Awaiting Assignment to Batch after the completion of First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to occur after SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases with no reviewer decline events
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Cycle Time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch measured from the immediately preceding Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch compared to the time from RW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time for Awaiting Assignment to Batch following First Look-Your updates are overdue versus following First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time for Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants where the process includes both SWâ€“Major Revision due in 1 month and RW-EIC Accept
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Awaiting Assignment to Batch and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch grouped by case:concept:name
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'end': '', 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
